          Creates a new CoNLLDependencyExtractor that assumes the default ordering for Malt dependency parses and uses the given TokenFilter and Stemmer.

          Creates a new CoNLLDependencyExtractor that assumes the default ordering for Malt dependency parses and uses the given TokenFilter and Stemmer and the given indices for each feature.

Methods in edu.ucla.sspace.text that return TokenFilter
 TokenFilter TokenFilter.combine(TokenFilter parent)
          Creates a chained filter by accepting the subset of whatever parent accepts less what tokens this filter rejects.

          Loads a series of chained TokenFilter instances from the specified configuration string.

          Loads a series of chained TokenFilter instances from the specified configuration string using the provided ResourceFinder to locate the resources.

TokenFilter(Set<String> tokens, boolean excludeTokens, TokenFilter parent)
          Constructs a chained filter that accepts the subset of what the parent accepts after applying its own filter to any tokens that the parent accepts.
